text: Rick Fox is the former head coach of Drake Bulldogs football team. He was named the head coach in December 2013, and coached his first game in 2014. He resigned from Drake on December 10, 2018.Rick Fox steps down as football coach at Drake ==Head coaching record== ==References== ==External links== * Drake profile Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Centre Colonels football coaches Category:Drake Bulldogs football coaches Category:Wheaton Thunder football coaches Category:Wheaton Thunder football players
title: Rick Fox (American football)
